title: STOP
body:
STOP FLASHING AWAY FROM ME {{champion:223}} I CAN PEEL YOU 

STOP IT STOP IT STOP REEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE

https://i.gyazo.com/cfdae7dde6ebd1d4490fea4af11cd181.png

replies.body:
{{champion:98}} *Ults to his ADC*
{{champion:222}} *Flashes away from enemy*
{{champion:98}} Aaaaand there goes top lane turret. Thanks.

{{champion:26}} _ults carry_
{{champion:202}} _flashes away, then proceeds to notive the buff and gets to the enemy team just in time for it to expire, then dies with out getting revived_
{{champion:26}} _cries_

The feeling...i know it so well. You deserve an upvote. It's also kind of like jungling when you want to gank but the entire team sits back and watches you 1v1 or 1v2 their lane when you could've won the fight if they joined

{{champion:412}} - *1 second to get lantern in range*

{{champion:412}} - *throws lantern*

{{champion:22}} - *Ally flashes*

{{champion:412}} - FFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFUUUUUUUUU

Call me a firearm, because I am fucking

#TRIGGERED
Sorry I've had too many troll Tahms to trust another again...
don't worry i'll only sacrifice you if we've already won.
Or if I really really want to.
SHHH they don't need to know that.

Playing {{champion:24}}  jungle, all 3 laners get solo killed 3+ times

{{champion:67}} : You're such a shit jungler

REEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE

*LULU WHY DIDNT YOU ULT YOU DINGUS????*

UH HELLO YOU ARE 50+ MILES AWAY FROM ULT RANGE?????

OMG I FEEL YOUR PAIN
Literally played lulu support and saved my allies many times with my ult, but there were SO MANY times where my team would just run away from me
At the end of the game our mid laner said "GG lulu never ults"
HOW AM I SUPPOSED TO ULT WHEN YOU ARE DIVING THEIR BACKLINE???
Ah the life of a support\healer in multiplayer video games. Your own teammates make it hard for you to help them.

thats why i switched to playing bard.

http://i3.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/newsfeed/000/247/207/813.gif

>
> thats why i switched to playing bard.

> http://i3.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/newsfeed/000/247/207/813.gif

secretly {{champion:432}}  the greatest support in the game

ty i might do some more today

do i want upboats or downboats though
do like me, and let your heart expresses itself
